.. _`Resources`:

Resources
=========
This section describes classes and functions private to lab-9. It is intended to document how the application works

labs.lab-1
----------
Teaches students about git and pull requests

labs.lab-2
----------
Teaches students about python virtual environments

labs.lab-3
----------
Teaches students about SQL databases

labs.lab-4
----------
Teaches students about Flask and SQLalchemy ORM

labs.lab-5
----------
Teaches students about gui design

labs.lab-6
----------
Teaches students login functionality with python

labs.lab-7
----------
Teaches students defensive programming

labs.lab-8
----------
Teaches students code testing with Pytest

labs.lab-9
----------
Teaches students about
